title: Base System Entity
description: The base for system-level entities (e.g., Stitch, Tenant) that manage workflows. It inherits identity and infrastructure requirements and enforces the absence of physics components (Rules 17 & 18).

entity_id.title: Entity ID Field
entity_id.description: A reusable definition for a unique entity identifier.

tenant_id.title: UUID
tenant_id.description: A canonical definition for a Universally Unique Identifier (UUID).

created_at.title: Timestamp
created_at.description: A canonical definition for an ISO 8601 timestamp with timezone.

x-infrastructure.title: Infrastructure Block
x-infrastructure.description: A canonical block defining the infrastructure components required to support a specific data entity or service.

service_template.title: Service Template
service_template.description: A Backstage template identifier for generating microservices.

database_module.title: Database Module
database_module.description: A Terraform module identifier for database infrastructure.

streaming_topics.description: A list of Redpanda topics this entity produces or consumes.

observability_dashboard.description: The Grafana dashboard template for monitoring this entity.

entity_type.description: The canonical type of the system entity.

workflow_state.title: Workflow State
workflow_state.description: Represents the state of a long-running, orchestrated workflow.

status.title: Status Field
status.description: The current status of a task or process.

last_updated.title: Nullable Timestamp
last_updated.description: A canonical definition for an optional ISO 8601 timestamp with timezone.

not.description: Rule 17.2: System entities MUST NOT have physics components.
